Nearly four fifths of Member States in the Region (42 countries; 79%) have, to some extent, incorporated the WHO 
recommendations on newborn, infant and young child nutrition into their national recommendations (Fig. 7.14).
Out of the six WHO regions, the European Region has the lowest rates of exclusive breastfeeding at six months 
of age [208,209] and is far from reaching the global nutrition targets for 2025 [184,207]. High rates of exclusive
